title: heart.zip
overview: The mini-series is a zip file in which each episode is a special folder. The collections are "Unexpected Kisses", "Good Word Fights", "Exciting Moments", "What Happened While Recording TikTok", "Borrowed a Hidden Camera to Confess". The unusual format conveys some impressions and moments from the lives of ordinary people, helping to find reflections of themselves in the stories of the characters.
